name: ocxxr
tagline: C++ bindings for the Open Community Runtime API
body:
This is a header-only library providing a C++ interface for the Open Community Runtime API.

### Resources for ocxxr

* [Project README on GitHub](https://github.com/DaoWen/ocxxr/#readme)
* [Doxygen pages](./doxygen/)

### General Resources for OCR

* <https://xstackwiki.modelado.org/Open_Community_Runtime>
